mapper.insert: INSERT INTO c6_exbtinfo VALUES ( #{exhibitionTitleKor}, #{exhibitionTitleEng}, #{openingTerm}, #{openingCycle}, #{firstOpeningYear}, #{openingScale}, #{openingCountry}, #{openingCity}, #{exhibitionHall}, #{participatingNationCount}, #{openingCountryCount}, #{overseasCount}, #{openingCountryVisitorsCount}, #{mainParticipatingNations}, #{KOREACompanyWhether}, #{KOREACompanyParticipatingCount}, #{totalVisitorsCount}, #{overseasVisitorsCount}, #{exhibitionArea}, #{sponsor}, #{personInCharge}, #{address}, #{telephone}, #{fax}, #{homepage}, #{email}, TO_DATE(#{createdDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{lastUpdatedDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{source}, #{dataOffer}, #{exhibitionItem}, #{remarks} )
